website_summaries.verdict: The LG Lucid 3 continues the company's tradition of solid entry-level Android smartphones on Verizon, but it's not as great a deal as the original.

customer_reviews.title: In Love With It
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the lg lucid 2 which was a great phone until i dropped in from the locker at work which i believe damaged the screen sensor not a phone issue is was a infected issue. Found a great price for this phone compared to what Verizon wanted for a refurbished phone. Switched everything over the day it arrived and Ive been in love with it easy to use nice big screen plenty of cases available to buy. Wasnt able to put it down for 24hrs almost.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Aunt

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget phone in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: Best Budget phone in my opinion! Good for games and the download speed is great! Very responsive and decent battery life compared to my 5c Shipping was super fast and item looked brand new!!! Speakers are nice and loud! Only con is the camera which is no big problem. It wont take a picture as good as the 5c but this is not a top of the line device. For what I wanted this phone succeeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: larry daniel workman

customer_reviews.title: or the input is bad. When plugged in
customer_reviews.text: The charger sent with the phone does not work, or the input is bad. When plugged in, a warning pops up to use the correct charger that came with the phone. It will not charge above 37%, and if the cord is shifted at all when charging, the phone goes back to less than 10%, which renders the phone unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lg lucid
customer_reviews.text: Works well and the shopping was as expected and received when it was noted that should be received
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked ok, battery won't charge right and dies when it hits 25%. Buying a used phone is a gamble.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew marcott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. This the second one I've own. My cat knocked my first one of the table and the glass broke. I liked this phone so much I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila A.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement phone
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted. Just like the one I accidentally dropped. And, I got a new one for only $50. It was still in the box and hadn't even had the battery put in it. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is like new. I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: GeeO

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes phone won't charge have to restart it due to it saying incompatible charger
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanl you for your quick response time. Exactly what I wanted. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bergthold

customer_reviews.title: Not worth to buy
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected ...charging slot was defective and there were huge sign of scratches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a Lucid so just wanted to upgrade. Bought the lucid 3 and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: frank rakijasic

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great, so pretty and really fun...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is beautiful. It's light and easy to figure out, lots of fun to play with. I would not recommend it for someone who needs a high quality camera, but to anyone who is not picky about their camera needs, this phone is great. One other thing is that when mine came to me, the sim card inside it was reported lost or stolen, we had to go to the store to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Brand New From Amazon with Lost/Stolen Sim Card
customer_reviews.text: Phone is fine. When trying to activate it, there was an error. Had to call Verizon, no big deal. However they said the sim card was reported lost/stolen. The phone came brand new from AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Williams

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: The worst phone ever!!!! We bought this phone on December 17,2014 activated it on the 24th and it went to a black screen on March 24th,2015. This phone lasted three month to the day. There is no warranty and can't be replaced. The worst $200 that I spent . I thought that it would at least lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: jeff gustafson

customer_reviews.title: he really disliked his old Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this fathers day present was not a success. My husband really dislikes this phone. It loses charge very quickly and is very slow opening apps. He was appreciative for a new phone, he really disliked his old Samsung, sadly this wasn't quite the upgrade I was hoping for him.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHudd

customer_reviews.title: Reilable phone
customer_reviews.text: My first smart phone and I'm still learning but so far I am pleased with this choice. I am not a big phone user but needed to move up. The price was right and it meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy T.

customer_reviews.title: A replacement for mine that died. Not your top ...
customer_reviews.text: A replacement for mine that died. Not your top of the line phone, but serviceable and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: It get's too hot to hold. The phone turns ...
customer_reviews.text: It get's too hot to hold. The phone turns off for no reason and does not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lg lucid 3 Refubished ..!!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS LG LUCID 3 REFUBISHED AND IT DIDN'T WORK I TOOK IT TO VERIZION AND THE .. MIC.. WAS BAD ..!
customer_reviews.author: Darkside

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone. It's possessed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible phone. It's possessed. Slow to send text messages and slow to receive them. Missed phone calls do not show up until hours later. The camera pops on when not requested.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: It works great, it is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace another phone that broke, and I didn't have insurance ( never again). This phone is much less expensive, and offers all of the features of my previous phone. It works great, it is lightweight, and it's not too small or too large. The battery life has been great. I have an LG tv that Iove that inspired my choice. I have not been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone in February. When I first got it worked good, but its horrible now. It freezes all the time, it will just shut down for no reason, and I have all ready done a factory reset on it twice. This phone is not a great phone. You can't even download more than 3 apps because then it takes up all the storage. I would never buy this phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a piece of crap!!! The internet freezes on me continuously. The sysytem gets stuck and won't respond unless I turn it off and then on or if I take the battery out and put it back in. Texting is a pain as it doesn't keep up and sometimes the cursor will randomly move to another word or it doesn't space between words. The battery life is short and I constantly have to charge it. This phone is expensive but I am on a contract with Verizon. I am going to do everything I can to pay off the contract and get away from this phone and quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Arguello

customer_reviews.title: great looking for new users
customer_reviews.text: It'ok It is easy to use good for phone dummies like I
customer_reviews.author: heavenly

customer_reviews.title: Mine may be a lemon, please stand by...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a mentally challenged iPhone 5c with the Lucid 3. I'm not too picky when it comes to bell-and-whistle features, so as a phone it's fine. The camera? Meh. The keyboard is very s-l-o-w at times and it seems like the operating system goes in fits and starts. Texting can be aggravating as the back button can be an adventure and the space button often decides how much finger pressure is sufficient to work. Internet is choppy, scrolling a true PITA. From the other reviews posted here and elsewhere, I'm pretty sure I've got a lemon. I'm going to make Verizon replace it and find out if it's this unit or the model line.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Riehle

customer_reviews.title: Camers and Blue Tooth unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: This phone sucks! The camera rarely works. I can never access the picture I have taken (on the rare occasion that I get the camera to work). Additionally, the blue tooth does not work in my car. I have to manually dial so what's the point. I had the previous model, and it worked well. This one just doesn't make me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jezz

product_meta.title: LG Lucid 3, Black 8GB (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description: The Lucid 3 by LG and its 4.7-inch qHD display make your movies, photos and games look great. It's stylish and light, too, with a 1.2GHz quad-core processor that runs your favorite apps with ease. Plus, the smartphone simplifies life with Easy Home, which puts your top apps and most-used features on a simplified home screen. *SIM Card not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
